# By State/Province

```{r results='asis', fig.width=10, fig.height=2, fig.align='center'}

#for ( vendor in dtWLOC$Vendor %>% unique %>% of(2)) { # for Embross only
for ( vendor in dtWLOC$Vendor %>% unique ) {
  
  DIV_START(vendor)
  
  # rmd.cat(glue::glue("## {vendor}"))
  
  dt[KIOSK_TCD==1 & WLOC %in% dtWLOC [Vendor==vendor]$WLOC] %>% 
    pik.report5numbers(paste0(vendor, ": PIK"), F )
  
  dt[KIOSK_TCD==3 & WLOC %in% dtWLOC [Vendor==vendor]$WLOC] %>% 
    pik.report5numbers(paste0(vendor, ": NEXUS"), F )
  
  DIV_END()
  
}

```
